START.name: bed! North East Corner
START.desc:
In this game you play as a toddler left in the IKEA Store.
U slowlee opem yor eye. The light nex to u is blinding. 
As u ar eye becom used to the light you undrstand tat u ar not
in yor crib...
at homee...
or in the warm of someone arms...
u screem as woud as u cn, but noo1 heirs u
U are too yung 2 die and must fend ur waye bak homee

F9D2.name: North East Window
F9D2.desc:
Weaving the bed u cee that u wer nex to the only lite in the wroom.
U cee the moon out the east window. 
it reminds u of homee.
 U see a supsiptous cleaning cart to the south
and the smooth tile flor to the west.

F9D3.name: South East Window
F9D3.desc:
U cee the moon out the east window. 
it reminds u of homee.
 U see a supsiptous cleaning man cart to the south
and the smooth tile flor to the west.

F9D4.name: South East Corner
F9D4.desc:
The cart man forget to pick up his yello sign
U procede too slip on the water left on the flor.
 Ooooow! u start crwying in ur puddle.
 U swudenly get destrwacted by a nice pillow in the distansce.
Dere is a escawator to the west, but it only gos up.

F9C1.name: North Birch Closet
F9C1.desc:
U struglle to git into the big closet, but u manage.
 U expec a hiden pasageway, but this is no bedtim stowy.
Saddened by yur own cuwiosity u sit down in the closet missing ur bed.

F9C2.name: F9C2
F9C2.desc:
a nice opin fwoor gweets u as it shines bak at u.
The fwoor fills u wif determination on ur qwest four sweep!
There is more shinee fwoor to the west,
 a towering white closet to the norf,
 a towring deschk to the south,
and a sinking feeling accompaniing ur realization of the darkiness of the rwest of the wroom

F9C3.name: F9C3
F9C3.desc:
The deschk haz a fase! Wate...
maybe no...
the desck stairs bak at u wifout bwinking...
There are som nice pilwows to the east,
Shineee flor to the norf,
a escawaitor rail blocking ur way to da souf,
a yello cart too the east,
 and the desck is gibbing u a dirty wook...

F9C3.desc:
